name: parallel
description:
GNU parallel is a shell tool for executing jobs in parallel using one or
more computers. A job can be a single command or a small script that has
to be run for each of the lines in the input.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependent_to.name: hybpiper
dependent_to.description:
HybPiper was designed for targeted sequence capture, in which DNA
sequencing libraries are enriched for gene regions of interest,
especially for phylogenetics. HybPiper is a suite of Python scripts that
wrap and connect bioinformatics tools in order to extract target
sequences from high-throughput DNA sequencing reads

dependent_to.name: freebayes
dependent_to.description: Bayesian haplotype-based genetic polymorphism discovery and genotyping.

dependent_to.name: redundans
dependent_to.description: Redundans pipeline assists an assembly of heterozygous genomes.
